projects.name: rust-gpu
projects.description: Making Rust a first-class language and ecosystem for GPU code
projects.extendedDescription: This is a very early stage project to make Rust a first-class language and ecosystem for building GPU code.

projects.name: texture-synthesis
projects.description: Example-based texture synthesis written in Rust
projects.extendedDescription: A light Rust API for Multiresolution Stochastic Texture Synthesis, a non-parametric example-based algorithm for image generation.

projects.description: Cargo plugin to help you manage large dependency graphs

projects.description: Cargo plugin for quickly fetching dependencies

projects.name: physx-rs
projects.description: Rust binding and wrapper over NVIDIA PhysX
projects.extendedDescription: Rust binding and wrapper over NVIDIA PhysX, a popular and mature physics engine particularly well-suited for games.
